meanings.sent1: Jeff is a popular name for boys.
meanings.sent2: My friend's brother is named Jeff.
meanings.sent3: Why did Jeff bring his pet frog to school?
meanings.sent4: In the story, Jeff was the knight in shining armor.
meanings.sent5: The name Jeff always reminds me of a friendly neighbor.

meanings.definition: To throw or toss something with force.
meanings.sent1: I will jeff the ball to you.
meanings.sent2: Please jeff the paper into the trash can.
meanings.sent3: Jeff the stone across the river and see if it skips.
meanings.sent4: She jeffed her worries away into the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind jeffed the leaves off the tree branches.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a person who is gullible or easily fooled.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a Jeff and believe everything you hear.
meanings.sent2: He fell for the prank again, what a Jeff!
meanings.sent3: Jeff thought the moon was made of cheese, how silly!
meanings.sent4: She tricked him easily, he's such a Jeff.
meanings.sent5: Being a Jeff in this world can lead to many surprises.
